text: καὶ οὕτωςουτως C [70%] RP,TR,CP ¦ ουτω f35 ℵA [30%] HF,OC,NU (I include this to illustrate that many MSS do not drop the final ς before a consonant, even in the minuscule period; which reinforces my suspicion that the practice did not obtain in the Autographs.) φοβερὸν ἦν τὸ φανταζόμενον, Μωϋσῆς εἶπεν, «Ἔκφοβός εἰμι καὶ ἔντρομος»)
